metadata.description: Official HashiCorp plugins and skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: terraform-code-generation
plugins.description: Terraform code generation skills including HCL generation, style guides, and testing.

plugins.name: terraform-module-generation
plugins.description: Terraform module generation and refactoring skills including module design and Terraform Stacks.

plugins.name: terraform-provider-development
plugins.description: Terraform provider development skills including resources, data sources, actions, and acceptance testing.

plugins.name: packer-builders
plugins.description: Packer builder skills for AWS, Azure, and Windows image creation.

plugins.name: packer-hcp
plugins.description: HCP Packer registry integration for tracking and managing image metadata.

plugins.name: vault-secrets-management
plugins.description: Vault secrets engine skills including KV, database, AWS, Transit, PKI, and Vault Agent.

plugins.name: vault-authentication
plugins.description: Vault authentication, identity, and token management including AppRole, Kubernetes, OIDC, policies, tokens, and response wrapping.

plugins.name: vault-operations
plugins.description: Vault operational skills including Kubernetes integration, HA/DR, monitoring, and troubleshooting.

plugins.name: vault-enterprise
plugins.description: Vault Enterprise skills including namespaces, replication, Sentinel policies, MFA, and HSM integration.

plugins.name: vault-mcp-integration
plugins.description: Vault MCP Server integration skills for AI-assisted secrets management workflows.

plugins.name: vault-hashicorp-integrations
plugins.description: Vault secrets engines for HashiCorp products - dynamic tokens for Consul, Nomad, and Terraform Cloud.
